parameters.jsCode:
// Mapeamento normalizado das institui√ß√µes
const mapping = {
  "bancocomercialportugues": "Banco Comercial Portugu√™s",
  "orthogon": "Orthogon",
  "revolut": "Revolut Bank",
  "volkswagen": "Volkswagen Bank GMBH",
  "raize": "Raize",
  "sfs": "SFS - Financial Services",
  "monese": "Monese",
  "cofidis": "Cofidis",
  "unicre": "Unicre",
  "novoatlantico": "Novo Atl√¢ntico",
  "atlanticoeuropa": "Banco Atlantico Europa",
  "big": "Banco de Investimento Global",
  "best": "Banco Best",
  "ctt": "Banco CTT",
  "credibom": "Credibom",
  "activobank": "ActivoBank",
  "bancomontepio": "Banco Montepio",
  "bankinter": "Bankinter",
  "bnpparibas": "BNP Paribas",
  "bni": "BNI Europa",
  "bps": "Banco Portugu√™s de Gest√£o",
  "bic": "Banco BIC",
  "bbva": "BBVA",
  "bnp": "BNP Paribas",
  "bnpcreditopessoal": "BNP Cr√©dito Pessoal",
  "cgd": "Caixa Geral de Dep√≥sitos",
  "cetelem": "Cetelem",
  "cmc": "CMC Markets",
  "cr√©ditoagricola": "Cr√©dito Agr√≠cola",
  "deutschebank": "Deutsche Bank",
  "ebankit": "ebankIT",
  "eurobic": "EuroBic",
  "eurobank": "Eurobank",
  "finibanco": "Finibanco",
  "finantia": "Banco Finantia",
  "grupoageas": "Grupo Ageas",
  "grupoocidental": "Grupo Ocidental",
  "ing": "ING",
  "jpmorgan": "JP Morgan",
  "kuanto": "KuantoKusta",
  "lendon": "Lendon.pt",
  "millennium": "Millennium BCP",
  "moneybox": "MoneyBox",
  "bpisa": "Banco BPI",
  "monzo": "Monzo",
  "morganstanley": "Morgan Stanley",
  "mymoney": "MyMoney",
  "n26": "N26",
  "nb": "NOVO BANCO",
  "novobanco": "NOVO BANCO",
  "oportocredito": "Oporto Cr√©dito",
  "opcredit": "OP Credit",
  "paypal": "PayPal",
  "pepper": "Pepper",
  "payshop": "Payshop",
  "plataformafinanceira": "Plataforma Financeira",
  "pluribank": "Pluribank",
  "popular": "Banco Popular",
  "prestamer": "Prestamer",
  "raiffeisen": "Raiffeisen Bank",
  "santander": "Banco Santander Totta",
  "seculo": "Banco S√©culo",
  "simplic": "Simplic",
  "sofi": "Sofi",
  "solidario": "Banco Solid√°rio",
  "sofisa": "Banco Sofisa",
  "transferwise": "Wise (ex TransferWise)",
  "unicredit": "Unicredit",
  "viabuy": "Viabuy",
  "wizink": "Wizink Bank",
  "abanca": "Abanca",
  "openbank": "Openbank",
  "banif": "Banif",
  "barclays": "Barclays",
  "bancoinvest": "Banco Invest",
  "bestbank": "Best Bank",
  "bmce": "BMCE Bank",
  "bancomillennium": "Banco Millennium",
  "bancomontepiogeral": "Banco Montepio Geral",
  "bancomontepiocr√©dito": "Banco Montepio Cr√©dito",
  "bancomontepiocomercial": "Banco Montepio Comercial",
  "novobanco2": "NOVO BANCO",
  "novobancocr√©dito": "NOVO BANCO Cr√©dito",
  "banconacional": "Banco Nacional Ultramarino",
  "banconif": "Banco NIF",
  "bancomontepiopoupan√ßa": "Banco Montepio Poupan√ßa"
};

const unidecode = (str) => str.normalize("NFD").replace(/[\u0300-\u036f]/g, "");

return items.map(item => {
  const registros = item.json.info_institutions || [];
  const output = [];

  for (const reg of registros) {
    const original = reg.instituicao || "";
    const clean = unidecode(original.toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-z0-9]/g, "")); // remove tudo que n√£o √© letra/n√∫mero

    let nomePadrao = original;

    for (const chave in mapping) {
      if (clean.includes(chave)) {
        nomePadrao = mapping[chave];
        break;
      }
    }

    output.push({
      ...reg,
      instituicao_formatada: nomePadrao
    });
  }

  return {
    json: {
      ...item.json,
      info_institutions: output
    }
  };
});
